header.gameNote: ATHLETES IN ACTION BASKETBALL CLASSIC AT SEATTLE WA

article.headline: Wright St. 75, Portland St. 70
article.story: SEATTLE -- Cory Cooperwood scored 13 of his 19 points in the second half and Wright State held off a late Portland State charge for a 75-70 victory on the second night of the round-robin Athletes In Action Classic. Wright State built a 15-point halftime advantage against the Vikings a night after giving a scare to No. 14 Washington on the first day of the three-day tournament, and the Raiders needed every bit of that lead. Portland State closed to 56-51 with 7 minutes left on Dominic Waters' 3-pointer, but Wright State pushed the advantage back to nine. In the final 2 minutes, the Vikings hit three 3-pointers to get within 72-68 with 21 seconds left, but Wright State made 3 of 4 free throws to hold on. Melvin Jones led Portland State (0-2) with 23 points and Julius Thomas scored 15. Troy Tabler added 16 points for the Raiders (1-1).

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
